name: A Little Place Called The Moon
content: I can see it in my mind
我能在我的脑海中看到这一切
I can see them get in line
我能看到他们井然有序地排队
Like a dream about to bloom
就像是一场即将绽放的美梦
We are going to the moon
我们前往月球
